tooltip.craftengine.enable_network: Changes requires re-entering the server to take effect
disconnect.craftengine.block_registry_mi:
Block registry size mismatch. Current: %s. Expected: %s. 
 1. Make sure that the configs are the same as the server's. 
 2. Do not use any mod that might register new block. 
 3. Do not install ViaVersion.
disconnect.craftengine.title: CraftEngine Connection Error
